TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Now your glasses need glasses

 

i wish life was found on mars

granted. turns out it eats electronic components from the perseverance rover, and uses them to poop out tiny spaceships to come to earth to eat all electronics

 

i wish live was found on venus

Edited February 23, 2021 by minerbat

Wish granted, but all of the life wants you to die.

I wish i could be playing KSP right now.

Granted. You put the keyboard from left to the right and start playing KSP right.

I wish Kerbin had whales.

Granted. The whales die because they have nothing to eat.

I wish for NO MORE SNOW.

Granted. No Santa this year.

I wish they stop calling Santa's gnomes elves, because the elves look different, see the LOTR movie.

But they where already el- aaand your dish causes so much confusion, it explodes

 

i wish the temperature didn’t go all over the place (it’s 80 degrees now, and a week ago it was in the single digits what)

granted. it becomes 60 degrees FOREVER... oh and im talking about degrees celsius (140 degrees fahrenheit)

 

i wish everyone used degrees celsius so that i didn't get confused when i hear someone talking about 80 degrees without saying the unit

Everyone uses rankh, which is like kelvin, but for Fahrenheit.

 

I wish random things happen less randomly

Wish granted, you are no more.

I wish for TUFX to release a new update.

TUFX now updates every day, BUT all they are just moving a character in the Readme file around. And then the mod breaks

 

i wish for Mars to have a planetary ring system that is completely stable, and doesn’t block out the light or burn the planet.

Granted. It crashes into Phobos creating a massive debris field around Mars. Mars exploration is stopped because space flight is impossible there. 
I wish for some cheese

Granted, you get plastic cheese.

i wish i had the emotional control of a vulcan master.

233102252021

Granted, you have the emotional control of Sybok. You get possessed by "The One" and crash your ship into the planet-that-shall-not-be-named-from-Star-Trek-V.

I wish for a better computer.

Granted
You have a personal mentat.

Spoiler

He will mentally play KSP for you.

***

I wish to bring away the coffee cup.

It’s brought to the intake of a jet flying over your house and the plane crashes into your house.

I wish for a invisibility shield around my house.

Granted. You can't see anything from inside.

10 hours ago, STORMPILOTkerbalkind said:

It’s brought to the intake of a jet flying over your house and the plane crashes into your house.

Impossible. If a plane if flying over something, it can't crash on it. Inertia.

***

I wish SN11 reaches 100 km instead of planned 10.

Granted, it’s engines went haywire and shot over to your house destroying it.

I wish that the DC-10 was still more commonly used.

The discotheque? What's wrong with it? It still works.

I wish to use all these useless crows as a drone network.

Granted, one of them gets confused and drops a armed grenade into your hands.
 

I wish the MD-11 was  still used in passenger service.

Granted. It's used as a restaurant.

I wish Cessna was ornithopter.

Granted, since you did not specify what model of Cessna it is used on a model that dose not exist.

I wish to wish for a wish that I wish for a pancake.

Granted. You get a panicake and start panicing.

I wish the hevea bees were gathering rubber instead of honey.

Granted, you are wrapped in rubber and suffocate.

I wish for a book that explains everything everywhere.

Granted. You have a cheque-book. It can explain everything to everyone.

I wish lightcoins were made of light.
